Posts.Content: naynat40 wrote: I was just diagnosed with IDC with DCIS. I know very little at this point, but today was my scheduled MRI. I am overweight and highly claustrophobic, and even with an oral sedative I could not remain in the space for even a few seconds. Ive been searching for a place in MN that can perform the breast MRI with an open MRI, or maybe even a larger bore. I have to get this done, and Im on the verge of panic. Any suggestions?? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MRI in MN? naynat40 Moderators
